entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
